section.title: Removing Tracks
section.para: A track can be removed from within the &MIX_WIN; by right-clicking in the empty space in the &TRACK_CONTROLS; to bring up the track context menu and choosing Remove.
Alternatively a track can also be removed from within the &MIX_WIN; by clicking on the track name button and choosing Remove.

warning.para: Removing a track is a permanent operation that cannot be undone. If there are no other tracks using the &PLAYLIST; that is in use by the track being removed then the playlist will also be removed from the session and will no longer be accessible.
